text:
Example: FV of an annuity due
What is the future value of an annuity that pays $100 per year at the beginning of
each of the next three years, commencing today, if the cash flows can be invested at an
annual rate of 10%? Note in the time line in the figure below that the FV is computed
as of the end of the last year in the life of the annuity, Year 3, even though the final
payment occurs at the beginning of Year 3 (end of Year 2).
